author: Moobeat (noreply@blogger.com)
title: 1/18 PBE Update
text:
[ NEWS :  State of the Game, January 2017  /  2017 Team Summoner Icons available  / New Warwick  Bio  &  Story  /  February sale schedule  ]

[This is a  W ORK  I N  P ROGRESS POST .] [ Status : The PBE is back up and online.]

The PBE has been updated!

Continue reading for more information!

( Warning : PBE Content is tentative and subject to change - what you see below may not reflect what eventually gets pushed to live servers at the end of the cycle! Manage your expectations accordingly.)

Table of Contents Warwick Update New Summoner Icons Miscellaneous Balance Changes 
Warwick Update [several skin changes - context on WW skin tweaks  1 / 2 . hold tight while we check on things and get some screenshots. arh-w ]



Hyena - [extra laughs added to  Q/R/W and when kills someone] 

New Summoner Icons !

New Ocean Week 2017 Icon 
This icon will be for OCE Week 2017 , a community event exclusive to OCE. No word yet on if this icon will be available to other regions. 

New Esports team icons: 
NA LCS : FlyQuest



VSCA : ROG Friends, Marines Esports, Next Gen, Young Generation, e.Hub United, Cantho Cherry, Team Ultimate



Updated 

NA LCS : Team Liquid

[ Old Icon ] 
CBLOL : KaBuM Esports
[ Old Icon ] 
Miscellaneous  Sewn Chaos Blitzcrank splash is now mirrored. 
Balance Changes *  Remember  *: The PBE is a testing grounds for new, tentative, and sometimes radical or experimental changes. Be aware that what you see below may be lacking context or other changes that didn't make it in or were implemented in an earlier patch this cycle! These are  not  official notes.

Champions Gragas 
Happy Hour (Passive)  heal increased to 6% from 4% 

Nidalee 
Bushwhack (Human W)  [To go with changes from earlier this cycle, W Tooltip now mentions " (Maximum traps increases at level 6, 11 and 16)"] 
Warwick 
Jaws of the Beast (Q)  AP ratio lowered to 90% from 100% 
Check out  [ THIS PAGE ]  for a  comprehensive list of the new content & changes currently on the PBE as a part of this cycle  or catch up with the individual update links below !
1/10 PBE Update: Warwick champion update, Sewn Chaos Amumu & Blitzcrank, new chroma, Practice tool assets, & more!  1/11 PBE Update: Warwick quote & short bio, Sewn Chaos Amumu + Blitzcrank tweaks, balance changes, and more!  1/12 PBE Update: Revealed Indicator & Balance Changes 1/13 PBE Update: Practice Tool enabled, Warwick login, Sewn Chaos splash art, and more! 1/17 PBE Update: Continued Warwick update tweaks, tentative balance changes, and more!  [ BACK TO TOP ]
